Toni Caputo

This Italian tattoo artist is specialized in character concept art. Toni has international experience (London and Amsterdam).

Guest artists that pass by our parlour


Saulo Brandão

This Brazilian tattoo artist from Fortaleza is specialized in portraits and realistic tattoos. Saulo has international experience (Germany, Switzerland, Spain, Italy) and is a winner of tattoo convention awards.

follow at https://www.instagram.com/saulo_brandao_/

Was here from 15 December 2014 to 28 February 2015
